channel.title: CMake on roamingthings
channel.description: Recent content in CMake on roamingthings

item.title: [100 Days of Code] Day 032: May 11, 2017
item.description: Today’s Progress: I wanted to base my STM32 project on a different example that uses LL (low level) drivers and better demonstrates the Usage of I2C on the STM32 for my purpose. Unfortunately I haven’t been able to get the example to compile (yet). Things I’ve learned: I learned that I either do not know enough about the stm32-cmake toolchain I’ve been using so far or that it’s not easy to switch between HAL and LL drivers on a per project base.
